name: forknjoin
description:
Fork and Join, a Sokoban-like puzzle game for GMTK2021.

Fork and Join are terms in parallel computing. See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fork%E2%80%93join_model

Fork(K) to create a worker, do some work and Join(J). Then work with him and pick him up,  and finish the level joined together.

Load custom levels: Visit github version and call loadlevel in Javascript console. See https://gist.github.com/misdake/a32c91c11a1f422127797c605ca5ca53
